title: Mid lane trialing. required rank: have been at least d1 or higher give or take.
body:
Team name: fluffy waffles

About us: Were a newly made team which finished 9th in the recent open ladder despite missing 5 tournaments. Were currently looking for an additional mid laner and realistically will make the next challenger series and finish top 3 in the next open split. Our team are a good bunch of people and are very friendly.

Criteria: Main criteria is you are looking to improve and get better! Must be over the age of 17. 
Top lane hunter is my summoner name add me if you are interested

Have a good one :)

replies.body: Add hectoncheir! He told me to tell him if i find any team openings!
Im gold 3 I tink dat eye kan compete ad me!
